ygData.subject: RE: Song Taunting.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Amen Anthem.   and typing fragments is the only way to go =) /g FEAR FEAR FEAR, PREAPRE TO ZONE ZONE ZONE. /g FEAR FEAR FEAR, PREAPRE TO
ygData.messageBody:
> Or else
> We learn to type
> in short little
> bursts like this!

Amen Anthem. <clickety click> and typing fragments is the only
way to go =)

/g FEAR FEAR FEAR, PREAPRE TO ZONE ZONE ZONE.
/g FEAR FEAR FEAR, PREAPRE TO ZONE ZONE ZONE.
/g FEAR FEAR FEAR, PREAPRE TO ZONE ZONE ZONE.

...after 3 ldcs show'd up out of the blue last night and no
enchanter to handle the situation. That's all I could type
after being pummelled for 400 dmg. Really get's the pulse
going...damn adrenaline.

Speaking of exciting, I got the chance to pull Sir Lucan
last night. About 12 people or so, all L45+ and they decide
I should be the poor loser who pulls him. (I've never fought
nor pulled him before, hell I had to actually track him to
locate his spot.) Wouldn't you know, one roaming guard, two
posted guards, one Brother Gentry or something and Sir Lucan
himself. 3 closed doors, 1 winding passageway to make an
escape. Yuck. I had reso, words, symbol ~1900 hp. Preparing
to get the worst beating of my life, I ran in opened two of
the doors, pulsed selo's, pixied lucan (just to get him pissy)
and made a run for it. The paladins in the group were joking
about how they'd watch me slowly lose hp and die. ;)

No such luck for them. I think Lucan's personal guard hit
me once for 100, and Lucan himself hit me for double 75 -
only after warping ontop of me. I beat them out of the
guard house so fast that they warped after I cleared
the front gates (smooch smooch battle drums).

During the Lucan fight, I tossed everything I had at the guy
and right before the party wiped him out, I zoned out. Was
a pretty fun night, and I still can visit the bard guild in
Freeport <g>

Harmonic.
